# WARNING: DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - IT WILL BE OVERWRITTEN WHEN UPGRADING!
dtoverlay=vc4-kms-v3d-pi4
dtoverlay=rpivid-v4l2
disable_overscan=1
disable_splash=1
dtparam=audio=on
hdmi_max_pixel_freq:0=200000000
hdmi_max_pixel_freq:1=200000000
